txt.en: Discover the entrance to The Fall of Khazad-Dûm
The Balrog known as Durin's Bane still lingered in Moria at the time of the Battle of Azanulbizar. You can recall the events of the kingdom's fall in T.A. 1981.
You have sensed the Balrog known as Durin's Bane just past the gates of Moria, and can recall the tale of the great kingdom's fall.
You sense the Balrog inside Moria, and are filled with dread!
Discover the entrance to The Fall of Khazad-Dûm.
